locations.name: Lisbon
locations.description: Portugal's vibrant capital city, the starting point of the tour, known for historic neighborhoods, trams, Fado music, and São Jorge Castle.

locations.name: Douro Valley (Wine Region)
locations.description: UNESCO World Heritage site famous for its terraced vineyards and port wine production. Travelers stay in traditional wine estates (Quintas). Coordinates are approximate for the central Pinhão area.

locations.name: Tavira (Algarve)
locations.description: A picturesque and authentic coastal town in the Algarve region, highlighted as an example, known for its charm, nearby beaches, and relaxing atmosphere.
